he deep depression over the southwest Bay of Bengal was located about 260 km northeast of
Trincomalee  and  305km  east-northeast  of  Kankasanthurai  at  05.30  p.m.  of  29th  November
2024. It is likely to move northwestwards, towards Tamil Nadu coast. It can be expected that
the influence of this system on the island's weather will gradually reduce after today (29).
